channel.title: Comments on: Can someone help explain the difference for me I‚Äôm confused.
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: S8228
item.dc:creator: S8228
item.description: One is optimised for new gen. One is for old gen. New gen has things like ray tracing. Older does not. But its a call of duty so its not worth the extra 10 bucks
item.content:encoded: One is optimised for new gen. One is for old gen. New gen has things like ray tracing. Older does not. But its a call of duty so its not worth the extra 10 bucks
